name: Parcel Mania
description:
Parcel Mania Description

Jump into the role of a post office worker and help sorting the packages for delivery.
Check the destination country on each package and throw it into the matching continent sorting box.

How many packages can you sort within 60  seconds?

This game was made for the Trijam 132 for the theme "Package delivered". Each team member worked a maximum of 3h on this game. Excluded from this 3h are brainstorming, writing of the game design document, task management, team discussions, compiling the game and creating the website.

How to Play
  • Move your character with WASD or the arrow keys
  • Aim with the mouse
  • Shoot with the left mouse button
Team
  • Sebastian Uitz (https://twitter.com/FireTotemGames) - Project Management, Game Design, and Programming
  • Manuel Santner (https://twitter.com/polylabs1) - 3D Modelling and Level Design
  • Michael Steinkellner (https://www.merlinnsound.com/) - Music and Sound Effects
Changes
  • v1.0 - 08.08.2021 - Jam Version
